name: Louma - the Roguelike Adventure
description:
Louma is a Rouguelike Dungeoncrawler. 

You decent deep into the Labyrinth of Louma to free the Souls of the Citiezen.
The Dungeon, the enemies and all of the loot is randomized. 

I hope you have some fun and please give me some Feedback to make the Game better.

Thanks for playing!
